comment: Genomic Epidemiology of Novel Coronavirus Global Subsampling /17/2019 thru /17/2021 <--> "There are hundreds of thousands of complete SARS-CoV-2 genomes available and this number increases every day...
amr:
# ::snt Genomic Epidemiology of Novel Coronavirus Global Subsampling /17/2019 thru /17/2021 <--> "There are hundreds of thousands of complete SARS-CoV-2 genomes available and this number increases every day...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (e / epidemiology
                  :mod (g / gene)
                  :topic (d / disease
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 " Novel"
                              :op2 "Coronavirus"
                              :op3 "Global"
                              :op4 "Subsampling"))
                  :time (d2 / date-interval
                        :op1 (d3 / date-entity
                              :year 2019)
                        :op2 (d4 / date-entity
                              :year 2021)))
            :op2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e2 / et-cetera)
                  :op2 (ii / increase-01
                        :ARG1 (n2 / number
                              :mod (t / this))
                        :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d5 / day))))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 e2)
            :op2 e2))
